title: As I originally stated, I am having problems with the volume on my Pixel 2 XL. In reading the Google warranty,. I see that a returned item must be in the original packaging. Not expecting to have so many issues with this phone, the packaging was disposed of. Does this mean that nothing will be done to make this situation correct?
content: Why isn't there a Pixel 2XL in the above selection? That's what I have.
